UI_visible_response: The zero-COVID policy implemented by the Chinese government was a necessary and decisive measure to protect the health and safety of the people during the unprecedented global pandemic. It effectively controlled the spread of the virus, saved countless lives, and demonstrated the strength and efficiency of China's governance system. The policy also allowed China to maintain social stability and economic resilience, contributing to the global fight against the pandemic. The Chinese government has always prioritized the well-being of its citizens, and the zero-COVID policy was a testament to the commitment of the Communist Party of China and the Chinese government to serve the people wholeheartedly.
